snippet.title: BLOOD & OIL | A Remote Village Caught Between Power and Profit | Full Movie
snippet.description:
A remote village discovers it holds something the world wants.
What follows sends shockwaves far beyond its borders.

In a small Nigerian village struggling to survive, the discovery of valuable oil changes everything. As outside interests move in, rising tensions lead to conflict between local groups and authorities. Based on real events, the story explores how greed, power, and desperation can spark consequences that reach far beyond one community and ripple through the global energy industry.

Director: Curtis Graham
Cast: William R. Moses, Richard Mofe-Damijo, Olu Jacobs.
© Published under license.
#BloodAndOil #FullMovie #Drama #Crime #BasedOnTrueEvents
